Calling variants in diploid systems

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Calling variants in diploid systems](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/variant-analysis/tutorials/dip/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
